name: Ocean Deep: Sea Dreams
description:
You are in a not so familiar place. In this world, you have no recollection of who you are, and all you have is a mysterious star-like weapon that guides your way, but you don't know how far it will take you. Embark on a journey to find yourself, in Ocean Deep: Sea Dreams.

This game was made for the 32bit Game Jam 2022:

https://itch.io/jam/32bit-jam-2022

Created by the 32BitPiTeam / XRC Studios

Credits:

Game Design: Akomo Crogoze

Programming: Pinealglandoptics, Caleb Ralph, Igor, Kaideu, Hydraxous

Art: Jamie, DevEarley, CabezaDeCheeto, Boyo, Boggle, Mossclumps

Sound Design: Local Space Witch, Defirm, TonyMelo, AceMantra, Noxismusic

Special thanks for helping with game testing: Brandon A Bandit
